name: Street Cleaning Simulator 2011
description: Have you ever wondered how its like to drive a road sweeper and how they manage to even reach the narrowest curbs? Would you like to sweep the streets without getting your hands dirty? Find it out in the new Road Sweeper Simulator 2011! Take a seat in one of three highly detailed road sweepers and keep your streets clean in various missions. You can solve them in a freely accessible and elaborate digital world.Different dirt-types and cleaning-techniques guarantee a lot of variety. You can choose between the according appliances for your vehicle, you can manually empty the dirt container and should not forget to reload it with fresh cleansing water. Or just complete your route and clean a city street. The missions and options are various in Road Sweeper Simulator 2011. Next to divergent missions, the graphical implementation of Road Sweeper Simulator 2011 will excite you: Experience a high class detailed particle-system and a dynamic daytime-change. Get to know the daily business of a real street cleaner thanks to the elaborate AI-traffic including pedestrians while you enjoy your ride in a realistic and moveable 3D-cockpit.Satisfy your curiosity for complex technology with the new Road Sweeper Simulator 2011!	  Features:  Drive 3 highly detailed, interactive vehicles with interchangeable appliances  Do a manual cleanout of dirt containers and reload the water tanks  Remove various dirt-types with different cleaning-techniques and solve challenging and divergent missions  Explore the freely accessible and detailed digital world with its complex AI-traffic incl. pedestrians  Experience a dynamic daytime-change and an elaborate particle-system
